mainboard.name: Infernal Grasp
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

mainboard.name: Archfiend of Ifnir
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature your opponents control.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Severed Strands
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

mainboard.name: Embereth Veteran
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Embereth Veteran: Create a Young Hero Role token attached to another target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.")

mainboard.name: Reckless Rage
mainboard.oracle_text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

mainboard.name: Woe Strider
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Woe Strider enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1.
Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Woe Strider escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.

mainboard.name: Guttersnipe
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

mainboard.name: Mogg War Marshal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

mainboard.name: Perilous Myr
mainboard.oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Pyroclasm
mainboard.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Skarrgan Hellkite
mainboard.oracle_text:
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Flying
{3}{R}: Skarrgan Hellkite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Activate only if Skarrgan Hellkite has a +1/+1 counter on it.

mainboard.name: Pharika's Spawn
mainboard.oracle_text:
Escape—{5}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Pharika's Spawn escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it enters the battlefield this way, each opponent sacrifices a non-Gorgon creature.

mainboard.name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
mainboard.oracle_text:
{2}{B}: Knight of the Ebon Legion gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Knight of the Ebon Legion. (Damage causes loss of life.)

mainboard.name: Flame Slash
mainboard.oracle_text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

mainboard.name: Unholy Heat
mainboard.oracle_text:
Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Incinerate
mainboard.oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

mainboard.name: Black Sun's Zenith
mainboard.oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: Goblin Guide
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.

mainboard.name: Kalastria Highborn
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

mainboard.name: Faithless Looting
mainboard.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainboard.name: Mayhem Devil
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

sideboard.name: Condescend
sideboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

sideboard.name: Fecundity
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

sideboard.name: Halo Forager
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Halo Forager enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. When you do, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

sideboard.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

sideboard.name: Bolas's Citadel
sideboard.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

sideboard.name: Orcish Lumberjack
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.

sideboard.name: Pteramander
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
{7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

sideboard.name: Stitch Together
sideboard.oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

sideboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
sideboard.oracle_text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

sideboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
sideboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

sideboard.name: Containment Construct
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever you discard a card, you may exile that card from your graveyard. If you do, you may play that card this turn.

sideboard.name: Iron Myr
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.

sideboard.name: Ravenous Squirrel
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Squirrel.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

sideboard.name: Lava Dart
sideboard.oracle_text:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

sideboard.name: Bone Shards
sideboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

sideboard.name: Persist
sideboard.oracle_text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

sideboard.name: Flame Jab
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flame Jab deals 1 damage to any target.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

sideboard.name: Agonizing Remorse
sideboard.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

sideboard.name: Isolated Chapel
sideboard.oracle_text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

sideboard.name: Restless Fortress
sideboard.oracle_text:
Restless Fortress enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{2}{W}{B}: Restless Fortress becomes a 1/4 white and black Nightmare creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
Whenever Restless Fortress attacks, defending player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
